name: Slide Puzzle - Duality
description:
On one side there is a forest.
The other is a void.

In the middle of your shack is a puzzle, use your views of these scenes to return the puzzle back to its original state. The game follows the conventions that you'd find playing with a regular slide puzzle.

Requirements:

  • HTC Vive
  • VR Capable Windows PC

Instructions:

  1. Find the red start button in the shack.
  2. Interact with it to disorganize the puzzle
  3. Interact with puzzle pieces to move them to the empty slot

Controls:

Place your Vive controller into the object you want to interact with and press the trigger to interact with it.
